articles.title: Coronavirus: all your questions answered
articles.description: It can be hard to sort fact from fiction when it comes to Covid-19. Infectious disease expert Professor Martin Cormican appeared on RTÉ's Liveline with Joe Duffy to answer questions from worried callers.

articles.title: Debunking the myths about food and the coronavirus
articles.description: There's no specific food guaranteed to protect you from the coronavirus so general healthy eating guidelines are the best advice for now

articles.title: Wife of Canadian PM tests positive for coronavirus
articles.description: Justin Trudeau's wife has tested positive for novel coronavirus, his office said, while assuring the public the Canadian prime minister is fine.
articles.content:

articles.author: RTÉ Sport
articles.title: Chelsea's Hudson-Odoi tests positive for coronavirus
articles.description: Chelsea winger Callum Hudson-Odoi has tested positive for coronavirus with the Premier League's club squad to go into isolation following the development
articles.content:
Chelsea's full squad have gone into self-isolation after winger Callum Hudson-Odoi tested positive to the coronavirus, the club said in a statement.
Hudson-Odoi displayed cold symptoms on Monday morning and has stayed away from the club since then. His test … [+966 chars]
